name: Anti-Designator Freeze Projector (aDFPj-13)
description: The anti-designator freeze projector senses the effects of a freeze designator. The weapon can be set to automatically fire at the designator or wait for a manual command.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
